one_reviews_text: First time using VR and I must admit the quality is not as good as I thought it would be. I'm used to seeing crisp visuals from a 1440p monitor and this felt like I was looking at 720p. There's not many free applications/games and the good stuff is pay, but even those which should showcase this product were disappointing to me. I did feel quite nauseous after short periods depending on what I'm doing, but would continue to feel sick for the rest of the day. It is a cool experience but the novelty factor runs out very quick, and the dizziness was just not worth it for me. Comfort wise it was fine, the product is light on the head and comes with a silicon edge to help improve comfort. There's even a spacer for people with glasses. There's only 3 adjustments for eye spacing, and I felt like I was always seeing the edges of the screen no matter the settings. Text is blurry unless you're facing it directly, and I'm not sure if this is intentional or not. Graphics was disappointing to be as I could see jagged edges, lack of detail in objects and unrealistic lighting. The concept is cool but to me I expected the execution to be almost perfected after all these years, but I feel like it needs a few more. The speakers were nice but I used them on maximum volume. Battery life is enough, you will probably get dizzy before it runs out (2+ hours). Controllers are extremely responsive and probably the most impressive part for me. There's also a built in microprocessor to communicate with all the kids online. Shooting games were difficult for me as I felt I needed to close one eye to aim properly. I can't really recommend this product even though my friends recommended it to me. I will be returning mine.
review_date: Reviewed in the United Arab Emirates on 26 December 2021
review_title: Might not work for some people..

one_reviews_text: The best electronic gaming product ever

one_reviews_text: Due to all the extremely positive tests and reviews on YouTube, I ordered my very first VR glasses.The operation is extremely good, especially Air Link via WLAN, no latency, everything responds directly.Now for the big problem, the IPD (interpupillary distance).I see everything blurry, why? Because the maximum IPD is 68mm.So I measured my IPD, it is almost 74mm.I did not know that you have to pay attention to this, you assume that the developers have thought about it and calculated everything, especially such a banality. Only 5-6 milimeters more!Why do you do that ?I found on Reddit and other forums, very many users who have the same problem.What were the developers thinking, please ?Measure your interpupillary distance beforehand, if it is greater than 68mm, the VR is completely unusable for you.I hope with the Quest 3, the problem will be fixed.Now I have to send the VR expensive back from Germany.Thanks for nothing.Best regards.
review_date: Reviewed in the United States on 26 August 2021
review_title: Absolutely poorly thought out IPD fitting

I tried to create a dummy Facebook account and it suspended my account making me upload pictures of my face.  What the hell!!!  I just want to play some games.  Shame on Facebook.  Shame on Oculus.  Shame on the employees working there.  Shame shame shame.  I’ll be returning this.  This is why Facebook is a garbage company.
review_date: Reviewed in the United States on 20 November 2021
review_title: Has to be one of the worst experiences ever

one_reviews_text: I think Facebook did a great thing with this "new" release of the quest 2. The headset itself feels quite nice, although the strap is definitely something to work on, it's way too front heavy. It's also extremely uncomfortable using glasses, unfortunately. Even with that said, the Oculus link feature was the only reason I bought this headset; and it's everything I could of asked for. My internet isn't even that good, all it needed was my laptop to be connected by ethernet for a smooth, high quality PCVR experience that I could take ANYWHERE IN THE HOUSE! I only had slight lags and stutters, but that's likely just my mediocre hardware. I'm a bit bummed by the comparably smaller control scheme compared to something like the vive.If you really want to have the best experience with this headset though, then don't put away that wallet just yet. At the very least, a new strap would be optimal, and I'd stay away from the first party elite strap. A new face cover might be good for you as well, as the default foam cover isn't the best for everyone.Overall, this headset is a great step in the right direction for vr tech. Although, out of the box, it should be subject to some modifications; which some could call a feature.One more thing, don't worry about the whole Facebook account thing. If you're fine with using whatsapp or Instagram, this shouldn't be a problem either. It's not like Facebook with Oculus is a new thing either, as Facebook has owned Oculus for 7 years now.Edit: after about a month of use, this headset has now become the most annoying piece of tech I own. The one feature I bought this for (Airlink) is straight garbage over half the time, im spending more time trying to fix this failure than I am actually using it. Connection hilariously unstable over ethernet with completely random performance drops. So both an unstable and sometimes unplayable experience that I paid 300 dollars for.
review_date: Reviewed in the United States on 27 August 2021
review_title: ~a month later, quest 2 is now just an annoying brick

one_reviews_text: Good device hate having to have Facebook.  Airlink is nice.  Just completely stupid that you have to have a Facebook to even use the device.  You are losing customers by forcing them to use Facebook.

review_title: Good device hate having to have Facebook

one_reviews_text: El visor es muy bueno para lo que cuesta. El precio real debería rondar entre 6000-6200 pesos. Sin embargo, para ser un precio mexicano se me hace entendible por la tarifa de importación.Ahora sí viene lo bueno: La experiencia. Es un visor de realidad virtual que demuestra calidad desde el unboxing, tal vez lo único criticable desde mi perspectiva sería la banda de la cabeza, pero se entiende totalmente porque oculus vende la correa elite por separado. La banda de cabeza no es incómoda, simplemente no va de acuerdo a la calidad percibida del producto en general, simplemente si puedes comprar la elite o una genérica, entonces sería lo mejor que puedes hacer.La experiencia de juegos es simplemente irreal, sumamente inmersivo y si le sumas el hecho de que puedes vincularla directamente a tu pc entonces se vuelve un game changer (si tienes una computadora que pueda correr los juegos). No considero necesario usarlo con un PCVR, pero se agradece demasiado poder hacerlo con un router casero con apenas 3-8 ms de latencia desde una habitación diferente conectado a la red de 2.5ghz. Si quieres desconectarte un par de horas del mundo (porque eso es lo que en promedio dura su batería) y pasar un buen rato, esta es la opción a tomar. Respecto a la batería, aunque pueda parecer algo escasa, es suficiente si tomamos en cuenta la necesidad de descansar los ojos, de todos modos si requieres más tiempo puedes conectarte directamente al pc adquiriendo cualquier cable usb 3.2 a usb c o a un powerbank de diversas capacidades para alargar tus sesiones de VR.Si esperas una calidad visual cercana a la que tenemos en el mundo real, entonces te recomiendo que inviertas en visores del doble o triple de precio, pero por este precio considero competente la percepción de los objetos renderizados por el visor por sí mismo y vía PC es sobresaliente, pero con puntos a destacar como lo son el texto que por lo que entiendo en casi cualquier visor de uso no profesional suelen notarse algo borrososos en algunos ángulos de visión, pero es cuestión de explorar y encontrar los puntos de enfoque de la visión para poder leer sin mayor esfuerzo texto en esta plataforma. Satisfecho 100% con esta compra.Edit: Desafortunadamente a la semana y media de uso murieron un par de pixeles justo en el centro, por lo que opté por devolverlo para posteriormente pedir otro que no tenga este defecto, así que por esto cambio mi calificación de 5 a 4 estrellas.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 2 September 2021
review_title: Precio bueno para ser México y experiencia de 10

one_reviews_text: Primeramente, el visor es de lo mejor qué hay en el mercado CONSIDERANDO el precio; un valve index es MUY caro, pero tiene adiciones qué el Quest 2 no y viceversa; eso es lo que lo hace un gran visor a comparación de los de tope de gama.Si tienes planeado usarlo para jugar en tu computadora:1) Necesitas una GPU y CPU capaces de correr realidad virtual.2) Requieres de un cable adicional cómo el Oculus Link, SIN EMBARGO, existen cables genéricos cómo alternativas, que son mejores, y más largos.2.1) Si vas a comprar un cable genérico, asegurate de qué sea:USB-C 3.1 a USB-C 3.1 ó USB-A 3.1 a USB C; estos cables rondan entre los 490-780 pesos mexicanos por el simple hecho de ser 3.1, ES OBLIGATORIO que sean 3.1 y no 2.0, porque de lo contrario vas a gastar de más al darte cuenta que vas a tener un rendimiento pobre, no gastes 200 o 300 mxn para después gastar otros 500 mxn.3) Una nueva correa o headstrap; sí, las reseñas eran ciertas; el headstrap o correa que viene por defecto es un dolor de cabeza (literalmente) es un mal diseño ya que no distribuye de forma homogénea el peso del viso sobre tu cabeza y por ende se vuelve incómodo a la larga.Yo compre el BOBOVR M2 y es una maravilla, tomando casi el diseño del Rift s, el soporte que te da en el occipital y la facilidad de ajustarlo lo hacen un aditamento indispensable.Y eso es todo lo que yo considero necesario para poder disfrutar el visor al máximo.Edit: RECOMIENDO USAR OCULUS LINK, SI EL CABLE ALTERNATIVO LES LLEGA A FALLAR, YA NO COMPREN DE ESE TIPO, VAYANSE A LA SEGURA Y USEN EL ORIGINAL, AUNQUE SEA MÁS CARO.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 22 September 2021

one_reviews_text: Fresnel lens added ghosting effect or blur effect which is major draw back to buy thisChromatic abberation is still visible (red & blue fringes) even after 4 years of evolutionThis is a AR/VR Game Devoloper reviewStill there is room for improvement. I'm comparing quest2 with my old device "s8+ with gear vr"GearVR Samsung S8+(2017) Vs quest 2(2021)s8+ 1480×1440q2  1832 x1920(still pixels are visible)s8+  3500mAhq2  3640mAhs8+ Convex lensq2  fresnel lens with added (ghosting effect or blur effect) biggest disappointmentNot Solved : Chromatic abberation (red & blue fringes) after 4 years of evolution510 vs 503 grams - no big difference still heavy to wears8+  focal adjustmentq2  No focal adjustment
review_date: Reviewed in India on 18 September 2021

one_reviews_text: My expectations were probably a little too high to be able to just plug the thing into my computer and start playing. It led me through a very linear and invasive data gathering setup with no way to skip or ignore. Why would facebook do this? They're making most of their money on this product collecting your data by linking this product to everything it possibly can. You are paying for a way for facebook to gather your info and make money off of it. You don't like it? Return it like I did. I have a lot of great things to say about the return process. This is the first thing I've ever returned, and I gotta say that it was a great process.Facebook stuff aside, the screen door effect was very noticeable and distracting. I might be a bit spoiled from having a 4k monitor, but it was definitely a large step down from where I would be impressed. The strap it comes with is pretty bad. I couldn't get it on my head right. When I did finally get it in an ok place on my head with the eye spacers just right, there was a GIANT gap where the nose section should meet my face. Everything said and done, I couldn't return the thing fast enough. I owned it maybe 2 hours before I totally lost interest.
review_date: Reviewed in the United States on 6 September 2021

one_reviews_text: Awesome experience with the new updated 128 gb version, i am still trying out new games but until now it has been a very good experience. Both my daughters 6 and 3 year old are enjoying it as well.First things first, you do not need a PC to use this VR headset, however if your an advanced gamer then you probably have a gaming pc that might work with PCVR games, others please check the minimum requirement before you buy a PC for PCVR gaming.Again note with this Quest 2 you do not need a PC it works standalone and you only need a good internet connection, you can buy or get free games from Oculus store or Sidequest, tons of video on youtube on how to use sidequest so check it out. Also you can install youtube and Netflix and use it to watch 360 videos and 3d  movies.Some complain of blurriness, so note you have to adjust the straps so that you are looking straight into it, everything in your periphery will be blur so adjust everytime you wear it, it should be sticking to your face tightly.If you have glasses then they need to be small as my computer glasses did not fit but i think you will have some problems when using it with glasses.Finally it absolutely fun to play with these, if you get it under 40 k for 128 GB then its a good deal in India , i tried shipping it out from US to India but the order was not completed as they do not ship things with battery so anyways buy it from here in India and it will be delivered the next day.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 12 September 2021

one_reviews_text: The best value for money standalone VR headset.Dont go for the negative review that it has bad lense or is cheap bla bla bla, cause you cant even find any VR standalone headset at this price.1. Quality is great, even if you drop it it wont break easily and still works, check out ThrillSeeker channel on youtube for more strees test that guy did.2. Lenses are old once, yes they are but in this segment they wont dissapoint you compared to $1000 Valve Index3. Resolution and FOV is good but not great but perfect for movies and watching 3d movies, 360 movies and Oculus games for sure. Casual user wont even find any difference4. Great library of games, litttle expensive but you get sales now and then and you have sidequest if you want more for free and also with some tricks you can install any android apps.5. The glimps and your start to metaverse6. Battery is a concern but get the cable creation cable and you are goog to go. Get the 16ft one7. Install Sidequest. (Mobile and PC) if you want a lot of best and free content and if you are a advanced PC user. Not recommended for users not fimiliar with advance PC use or adb, but you get a tons of tutorial on youtube if you want to try.8. If you have a good PC, VR ready GPU, then this can play Steam VR as well, now it has Airlink wireless as well, but you need Wifi6, 5ghz band and PC connected using ethernet for best quality.9. Amazing hand tracking and controllers at this range10. In any case you end up scratching the lenses, get a polywatch solution and see the magic, it would be as good as new, thank me later for that advice. See youtube for more info11. Great mutiplayer capabilities, mic is great and stock speaker are just awesome, and you can still connect your own headsets as well.12. Get a rechargable battery for your controller, cost around rs400 with batgery and its charger.13. If you still have more money get an Elite strap for best comfort and wobble free experience.14. If you sweat much, mind that you might see fog on lense on prolong use, there are tons of alrernatives to try to avoid that, but the cheapest option is simply put a tissue to your forehead and put on the headset and good to go.15. You are still here that means you are convinced, just go for it and buy it, you will not regret for sure. Search me in case you need more assistance on Oculus,  Ashura- is my Oculus id.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 28 December 2021

one_reviews_text: Realizei a compra através da loja DigitalFlash, o produto chegou rápido e é excelente! Vale muito a pena ter um Oculus Quest 2, parece ser resistente, tem ótima resposta dos comandos e fica bem preso na cabeça. Eu já tinha usado um VR do tipo que encaixa o celular como tela, mas não se compara com esse Oculus Quest que realmente foi feito pra isso. Vem com o Oculus e os controles, chegou rápido, a caixa estava lacrada e não estava danificada. Recomendo!
review_date: Reviewed in Brazil on 30 December 2021

one_reviews_text: Produto maravilhoso, funciona perfeitamente, é MUITO divertido com toda certeza... O único problema é que tive um problema com o controle esquerdo... Como uso muito em games de tiro, utilizo o analógico do controle esquerdo com frequência, e acho que consequentemente ele começou a dar problema... De vez em quando ele fica mexendo sozinho o analógico pra baixo. Tentei entrar com o suporte da loja para poder trocar o controle, uma vez que faz aprox. 1 mês que estou com o produto, e na "elegibilidade de devolução/troca" está dizendo que faz 3 dias que venceu meu prazo para troca do produto e 2 dias para a devolução do mesmo. Mandei mensagem para a loja faz um tempo fazendo tal reclamação, porém não me responderam e agora perdi o prazo de troca/devolução.De qualquer maneira, o produto é maravilhoso, funciona perfeitamente (tirando o problema do controle que acho que foi mais má sorte minha mesmo, já que meus amigos que também tem, nunca tiveram esse problema), e minha reclamação fica apenas com o compromisso da loja com o cliente. Agora não sei como  posso arrumar o controle. E aqui onde moro não possui assistência técnica para isso... PRODUTO: Nota 9,5; Entrega: NOTA 9; VENDEDOR: 5.
review_date: Reviewed in Brazil on 2 February 2022
review_title: INCRÍVEL, só tive um problema infortuno

review_date: Reviewed in India on 30 September 2021
review_title: Not worth the price and time.

one_reviews_text: La verdad que he probado por primera vez las VR y puedo decir que es bastante asombroso hay mucho que se puede hacer utilizando directamente las quest 2 o conectándolas a las pc, puedo decir que es bastante practica, los controles son muy inmersos y cómodos en su totalidad, por otro lado tienes funciones como usar los dedos de las manos como mando gracias a las cámaras de la parte de abajo para controlar las quest 2, compatible también si lo usas en pc. Puedo decir que tiene bastantes accesorios que hacen que el Quest 2 sea aun mas cómodo.Igualmente vi un par de observaciones y me atrevo a responderlas.Lo de la distancia de los ojos, cuenta solo con tres modos y puedo decir que directamente puede ser conflictivo para persona que se encuentran fuera del rango que tiene, por lo que he visto en otros videos sobre su antecesor este no tenia el problema por que se ajustaba un poco mas libre.Vista ligeramente borrosa esto si lo puedo confirmar pero igual no es algo que sea tan grave ya que al estar jugando no lo notas.La duración de la autonomía.A esto si pude notar que dura solo 2 horas, pero pues tengamos en cuenta el por que teniendo lo del seguimiento de los mandos las 4 cámaras que tiene en funcionamiento en todo momento para la inmersión en vr, una pantalla que casi da 2k a 120hz y una potencia que considero muy buena pues hace que todo esto se gaste rápido.¿Como lo soluciono? Pues solo compra una PowerBank ya sea de 10000 MaH o 20000, con eso te dará suficiente para jugar durante unas 4 o 6 horas, al menos a mi me ha dado ese tiempo.Por otro lado la duración de la batería de los mandos es bastante larga eso si lo puedo asegurar.Temperatura.En lugares donde tengas ventilación y no en temperatura normal podrás notar que no se calienta, pero al andar en lugares donde no tengas ventilación y a temperatura normal vas a ver que si se calienta como cuando juegas con tu teléfono a brillo máximoHe leido algunas observaciones de lo que es el Oculus Quest 2 sobre lo que es que puede ser incomodoCosas que podrían ser desventaja?Pues el hecho de que requiere una cuenta obligatoria de Facebook para poder utilizarlo quizas para la mayoría dirá "MEH tengo cuenta de Facebook" pero recordemos que hay gente que no le gusta dicha plataforma y considero que pues no es necesario, igualmente la desventaja esta que las aplicaciones que hayas adquiridos se enlazan con dicha cuenta, si pierdes esa cuenta pierdes las aplicaciones. Y pues igual he leído algunas reseñas que dicen "Me cree una cuenta de Facebook y a la semana me la bloquearon por que decían que era cuenta falsa y perdí todas las aplicaciones adquiridas".Por otro lado el sujetador es de un material de plástico y tela que a largo plazo de utilidad es incomodo, por suerte se pueden comprar otros sujetadores mas cómodos.¿Como se conecta a la PC?Existen dos maneras la primera es usando AirLink que considero poco practico y problemático al menos de las veces que intente usar la pc, por otro lado puedes adquirir Virtual Desktop que cuesta 15 Dolares que pues igualmente lo mismo, pero este si es completamente practico. La segunda opción seria utilizando solo  un cable que sea de 3.0 o superior, que por lo menos con uno de un Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 pro me ha servido.Lo vale? Si honestamente lo vale por la cantidad de juegos gratuitos que puedes descargar tanto en la plataforma oculus o de sidequest o también jugando en la PC.OJO: La foto con el sujetador actual se compro por separado no es el original.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 16 March 2022
review_title: ¿Eres nuevo en realidad virtual? Pues esto es para ti!

one_reviews_text: Las primeras veces que lo usas se siente un poco extraño y te puedes tener pequeños mareos, pero después de un rato te acostumbras. Los usé en PCVR con "Air Link" (conexión wifi) no tuve ningún retraso o lag en el PC.Por ultimo debo decir que los gráficos de PC y los de Oculus se ven diferentes, el de Oculus se ve de menor calidad pero no es nada del otro mundo, se disfruta bastante (esto lo digo por quienes no tienen PC y no saben si comprarlo)
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 14 February 2022

one_reviews_text: Money well spent. I think made a right choice to buy Oculus VR instead of X-box or PS5. Awesome VR experience.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 27 January 2022

one_reviews_text: Got it on 25/01/2022. Writing this on 09/02/2022.TL;DR -Great headset. Absolutely worth the price. Buy paid games if you want to take full advantage of the Quest 2. There are other ways too to play a paid game as this is an android interface. My User ID in Eleven Table Tennsi is ZIGZAG@WII. find me there and we'll have a good match.Now, to those who really want to read this review,Pros.1. The moment you put it on, you'll want to stay in it and touch every part of the environment you're in. In some cases you can, in some you can't.2. Myth that the vision is blurry is true. But you'll find it's more than usable but not quite as sharp as any other more expensive VR headset like the Valve Index or the HP Reverb G2. But at this price point, it's the best you'll ever get!3. YouTube 360° is reaaallly good. Netflix's video quality is more than OK but not as sharp as you'll find on your phone at 1080p. Prime video is surprisingly better quality than that of Netflix.4. You'll find free games those are good for what they offer but paid games will blow your mind. Some of the examples are 1. Eleven Table Tennis (outstanding physics and totally realistic 97% of the times), 2. Beat Saber (it's the poster child of the Quest 2), 3. Pistol Whip ( makes you feel like a cowboy shooting targets in slo-mo and doing that to the beat!), 4. Zenith- The Last city (the closest we've come to a VR MMO like SAO)Cons.1. As I've written above, the blurry quality. Nothing we can do about it. Some YouTubes have found some settings to increase the quality and frame rate in developer mode but it resers everytime you turn off the Quest 2.2. The strap and the padding. There's always better ones out there so find them. In India, it's either pricey or impossible to get.3. You get a US flat pin charger in the box so use it with a 3-pin that supports it.4. I'd suggest you use the charger given in the box as there have been reports of the charging port melting due to excessive charging and what not.I will, if I can, edit this review in the future if I come across anything new. Beware of 5 star reviews as the seller gives Amazon gift cards in the box to give 5 star ratings. Other than that, the package arrived safely and on time so no problem there. Thanks for reading it so far. 🖖🏾
review_date: Reviewed in India on 9 February 2022

one_reviews_text: Not only is this an amazing gaming device, did you know that there are other uses for it too?For example, there is an app that can help you learn to play the piano, as well as an excellent remote collaboration app that can be used for remote office work!
review_date: Reviewed in Singapore on 3 September 2021

one_reviews_text: I was skeptical before buying this one as many had reviewed about blurriness and not enough IPD. Here is my experience:Pros.:1) Just amazing clarity in vision  and sound. Really immersive, takes you into a whole new world.2) Wireless. The big advantage of being able to play standalone games and pcvr via wifi.(You will need pcvr ready pc and wifi 6 though if you are thinking about pcvr otherwise there would be lot of lag). I don't play pcvr much and standalone games are great.3)Hand tracking is great feature. It's rather in experimental stage in my opinion as not many games or app use it but it will be popular in near future.4)Cheaper than other VR consoles. Even with great features, the price is reasonable.Cons.:1) the face interface could definitely use better foam and leather or synthetic covering.2) I have 3d printer so I got my self strap support for free which made it really comfortable to use. For those who don't have 3d printer, finding good quality elite strap would be a hassle and extra cost. Company could have provided that.3)Facebook login. You have to use fb account to use all the features of console. I think that could have been avoided, but we are already using Google account for everything in our phones so our privacy is already compromised. Still if you don't want to use your main fb account,  you make a new fb account and sign in via that one.4) The device has lot of potential for great AR use, but due to laws and set limitations there is not much development in AR and VR section.5) Though there are games available on sidequest to play for free, company should have made a few free games of their own rather than limiting to "first steps". You also need to take cost of buying games into account. But as I said there is a lot of free stuff on sidequest to keep you engaged.So overall I would recommend this to those who can accept the limitations of the device. And yes before buying, please check your inter pupillary distance (IPD), so that you know if it is OK for you to buy or not.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 10 December 2021

one_reviews_text: Very good VR headset in this price point. There are several points that could be improved. First, the screen door effect, it's quite a bit and that limits you immersion. Many reviews say that Quest 2 has almost no screen door effect, but I found it not to be true. It is less, but not completely gone. Field of View could be improved. And few other things. Otherwise it's a killer entry level VR headset.For me the best feature is the ability of play PC VR games wireless. I didn't use Quest 2 as standalone for two reasons. 1. The quality of PC VR is unmatched. 2. the same game which is available in Quest Store is at-least 3 times more expensive than steam counter part. With Oculus AirLink I can play every game nicely. There are few times when frames get dropped and that hinders game play, else mostly it's great. It could be my network gears as well. For Beat Saber it's too much (almost all the songs gets dropped frame resulting missing hits), and for other games it's there but you can live with it.This is a very good VR headset. If you can afford to buy HP reverb G2 as well, buy both, if you can afford to buy any of those, go for G2. Or if you buy Quest 2 only, you will still be having awesome time.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 15 November 2021
review_title: Very good VR headset in this price point

one_reviews_text: O produto é muito bom. Porem meu controle esquerdo não funciona corretamente, usei umas 5 vezes e agora o controle esquerdo se teleporta, fica se mexendo sozinho. Impossível usar nos jogos. Devolvi para o vendedor porém o vendedor não me devolveu de volta. DECEPCAO TOTAL ESTRAGOU TODA MINHA EXPERIÊNCIA. No fim fiquei sem o controle e a empresa nem deu satisfação.
review_date: Reviewed in Brazil on 14 February 2022

one_reviews_text: ## Pros:- Cheap, Meta is selling at this price probably at a loss to attract more people. 128GB for around 33-35k is a great price.- Relatively higher resolution compared to a non-existent competition in this price range.- The quality of sensors is top notch. The tracking is extremely accurate.- It's relatively lightweight and can run off battery which means no cables. Very convenient and definitely the future direction.## Areas for improvement:- The displays could use OLED for better blacks. Though using OLED will hurt longevity so this one gets a pass. Currently blacks are like gray and that is something you will notice if you look for it.- The resolution could use an improvement. Again, it's an extremely competitive resolution for the price, but since it's so close to your eyes, even this feels pixelated and low res. It's early VR tech so expect that to improve with time.- The battery life is barely 2 hours on a full charge depending on what you're viewing. It's reasonably good, but in the future we could be looking at more efficient devices.- There should be a OS level simulated way to rotate when sitting still. It's tedious to have to get up just to rotate to other side of a 360 degree video. Allow simulating that via controls or something on OS level.- The headset strap is not comfortable for long wearing sessions. I should not have to spend more money to get a better quality strap. Wearing this device is a primary function and you shouldn't have to buy an accessory to make it better, regardless of the price. Only possible con I an think of, but it gets a pass this time.- On a related note, as this tech gets better, I expect components to shrink and this to get lighter and sleeker.- Would be nice to not have to create a Facebook account for this, but let's be honest, that's why they're selling this at a loss. To collect more customers and collect your data to target ads at you. That's how they make money, by selling ads and services.- Remotely installing apps from mobile is a hit or a miss. Most times it doesn't start downloading and I have to manually trigger app downloads. I think it's a temporary bug which they can easily fix.## Other notes:- Use Firefox reality browser. Way better than default and support ad blocking, multiple window and is also far more convenient and reliable with Web XR experiences.- Give Oculus TV a try. It's like YouTube VR but the interface is much nicer and the recommendations are also extremely good.- You can cast your Oculus view to your phone. This is super convenient when showing this to a friend or family member. Just cast to your phone so that you have a sense of what your friend/family member is seeing and guide them accordingly.## Summary:Great stuff honestly. Making VR affordable (regardless of the intentions) also opens it up to more developers across the world and that will only help give us better VR experiences over time. Looking forward to develop some WebXR and native oculus experiences using this.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 6 January 2022
review_title: Well worth the asking price, but can expect some big improvements in the upcoming years..

one_reviews_text: Mucha gente tiene la duda sobre si comprar o no las Quest 2 para poder jugar a juegos como el Pavlov, el Subnautica, SuperHOT, Half Life Alyx, etc.Si, si se puede, y es muy recomendable, pero antes que nada, estas gafas de VR a diferencia de las primeras que lanzó Oculus, no son solo dos monitores y ya, es una consola.Una de las mayores ventajas que yo le veo a las Quest 2 es su modo inalámbrico, o el modo que viene por defecto. Si bien el consumo de batería en este modo es, pues, importante, los gráficos que podemos apreciar no solo no están mal, son lo suficientemente buenos para mantener un frame-rate adecuado, y una inmersión muy buena, y todo esto sin necesidad de una PC.Los altavoces que vienen incluidos son bastante buenos, están muy bien direccionados y no se ven afectados en gran medida por el ruido ambiente a menos que tengas una cantidad criminal de ruido ambiente cerca de ti, en cuyo caso se pueden usar audífonos cableados por un jack de 3.5mm, y también recomendaría buscar un lugar que no tenga tanto ruido ambiente, así es como te da tinnitus.Yo recomiendo revisar la Store de Oculus desde su página si planteas nunca conectar las gafas a una PC, seleccionar varios juegos que te gusten y considerar si son suficientes para realizar la compra. Spoiler: los juegos de la Oculus Store son todo, menos baratos.De igual forma, Oculus nos ofrece dos formas de conectar nuestras gafas a una PC para poder jugar, ya sea juegos de la tienda de Steam, o juegos de la tienda de Oculus directo al PC (esto para obtener mejores gráficos y mayor framerate): Air Link y Link.El AirLink funciona vía wireless, y es la única que he usado. Si tu internet tiende a presentar intermitencias por más cortas que estas sean, o si tu PC tiene problemas con tener muchas aplicaciones abiertas, quizá el Link sea la mejor opción, en cuyo caso, tienes la opción de conectarlo vía USBC-USBC, o vía USB3.1-USBC, y por las reseñas y opiniones que he podido ver, ambas opciones funcionan casi igual: latencia extremadamente baja, consumo de batería decente en el caso del Air Link, posibilidad de manipular la PC desde las gafas, y gráficos bastante buenos.Si tienes un poco de dinero que te sobre y quieres experimentar cosas nuevas relacionadas al gaming, son la mejor opción, eso si, por su precio regular, ni se les ocurra comprar las versiones de 128GB en 9,000 pesos o más, pueden comprar las Quest 2 en su precio normal, 2 a 3 juegos en la tienda de Oculus o de Steam y el cable Link de 5 o 10 metros por los 9,000 pesos que cuestan las gafas por temporadas, lo mejor siempre es estar revisando los precios.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 12 March 2022
review_title: No es solo un accesorio, es una consola.

one_reviews_text: The order was placed on 21 October 2021, and received on 25 October - 4 days to be shipped from USA to Singapore! Amazon Prime membership has it's perks.The Oculus box was well packed and protected, and in impeccable condition.After setting up the pre-requisite Facebook account, the first images on the headset were astounding. The screen was clear, and sound from the built in speakers better than expected. The demo games I downloaded so far were Saber Beat and Superhot, both were entirely immersive.VR headsets has improved tremendously in the last few years, and for USD299, it's a bargain. I would highly recommend the Quest 2 to anyone.
review_date: Reviewed in Singapore on 26 October 2021
review_title: Wow, this is a different level of VR!

one_reviews_text: Eu já conhecia o dispositivo de VR da Samsung. Era muito bom, embora necessitasse do celular para funcionar. Infelizmente a Samsung descontinuou o produto. Felizmente o FACEBOOK resolveu assumir a Oculus e o resultado foi um produto primoroso.  A imersão é bastante convincente (você se esquece, muitas vezes, de que se trata de uma simulação, tal o realismo das imagens e o do oferecidos). Trata-se de uma experiência que eu recomendo, fortemente. :-)
review_date: Reviewed in Brazil on 31 January 2022
review_title: Muito melhor do que eu podia imaginar! :-)

one_reviews_text: No esperaba que fuera así de bueno, tenía mis dudas, ya que necesita una cuenta de Facebook para poder usarlo, pero todo bien hasta ahora, se siente increíble, cada que los uso me sigue impresionando, lo recomiendo 100%Lo único malo que tiene, es que el soporte para la cabeza se vuelve muy incómodo después de un rato, y que el sistema operativo que tiene suele fallar y ya sea que se congele la imagen o que se traben los menús y tarden en responder, (eso no pasa cuando lo usas conectado a la PC), no siempre pasa, pero suele pasar e incómoda un poco.Fuera de eso, todo excelente, si estás empezando en el mundo del VR igual que yo, definitivamente estos son los que debes tener.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 15 October 2021

one_reviews_text: El dispositivo es nuevo, caja en perfectas condiciones, me gustó que añadieron un protector facial de silicón que por lo que leo normalmente no viene incluído y es de los comentarios más mencionados (la pieza original absorbe sudor y con el aditamento esto no pasa) recomiendo encarecidamente conseguir el adaptador para la nuca o la correa para la cabeza  para hacer la experiencia más cómoda, en general por la cantidad de aplicaciones (gratuitas de paga demos y versiones beta) disponibles el dispositivo vale mucho más del valor de venta sin tener que gastar más. Altamente recomendable buscar los tutoriales y recomendaciones en youtube para evitar dañor o banneos con y del dispositivo.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 3 February 2022

one_reviews_text: La experiencia del VR es única, no esperen ver gráficos super buenos de forma nativa, a menos que lo conecten a una PC muy potente. Pero de manera independiente el oculus ofrece una experiencia única, jugar sin cables ayuda muchísimo a la inmersión, de plano te desconectas del mundo exterior y vives los videojuegos!. El único detalle es que la batería es insuficiente para sesiones largas de juego, pero aún así estoy muy contento con mi compra, lo recomiendo totalmente, en especial a quienes no han tenido un acercamiento con el VR.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 14 December 2021

one_reviews_text: O produto veio no prazo sem danos, mas apos uma semana de uso o controle esquerdo começou a dar problema no analógico, depois parou de vibrar, agora o direito também esté com problema no analégico, já pedi devolução a vários dias e não entraram em contato, várias pessoas que conheço estão tendo problema com esse Oculus de 128gb. Recomendo que esperem uma nova versão do produto.E não, nunca bati o controle em nenhum lugar, tenho uma área grande justamente para jogar.
review_date: Reviewed in Brazil on 11 April 2022

one_reviews_text: Delivered well before time despite the lockdown restrictions. Packaged / Imported in Aug 2021. Silicone cover included. An excellent product which will be used by my entire family over the next few years.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 23 September 2021

one_reviews_text: Bem-acabado, desenvolvido, embalagem perfeita, funciona muito bem.Para jogos com mais detalhes gráficos ou mais pesados, recomendo o uso do como de dados. Para algo mais casual, ou mais simples, o Air Link funciona muito bem. Existe todo um conjunto de recomendações para o Air Link, que é usar 100% sem fios, vale ler o material no site do Oculus Quest 2 para se familiarizar com as necessidades básicas. Já adianto: um roteador AC1200 é o mínimo para operar.
review_date: Reviewed in Brazil on 8 March 2022

one_reviews_text: Was really excited for this one but recieved a used product with dirt marks all over it. Items missing
review_date: Reviewed in India on 6 November 2021
review_title: Used and dirty product recieved with missing items

one_reviews_text: Its a different experience to play game and Also eatch 3d movies in vr like you go and watch in a big screen. The battery lasts for about 2 hrs if pcvr game is played or movie is seen. The headset can connect to pc via airlink just make sure you have a 5ghz wifi connection.  I gave played stream games, watched youtube vr 360 videos. It feels great. It may take a day to adjust to seeing inside the headset.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 4 January 2022
review_title: Awesome  experience to be in vr

one_reviews_text: I had been using this for almost a month before writing a review. This VR headset is an all in one headset, it can be operate like a smartphone without connecting to a pc.Future owners who confused on the storage capacity selection there are few tips here. 128 GB is already sufficient for me to store around 15 apps with some additional storage left. 256 GB might be a better choice for you if you have tons of files to store in the VR headset without planning to remove it.I have a larger head with spectacles, the original straps will be too tight for me. Even if I am not, I highly recommend the new user to own a straps too, it is way more comfortable when you are wearing it.
review_date: Reviewed in Singapore on 22 January 2022

one_reviews_text: siempre he visto a los oculus más como una plataforma de juego como un dispositivo de experiencias, ay que la inmersión que ofrece es única que puede llegar a ser divertida, aterradora o reflexiva. en general vengo de la versión anterior y esta es increíble no usar cable para trabajar es muy interesante a un que su batería no dura mucho apenas para una fiesta en vrchat de ahí en fuera esta versión de almacenamiento está bien ya que muchos de los juegos están en mi PC y ahorita que se ha actualizado para mejora la conexión entre el pc y el oculus es increíble.aconsejo si van a conectar sus oculus a PC usen un Wifi de 5Ghz para que no haya perdidas
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 22 April 2022

one_reviews_text: O produto é exatamente conforme descrito no anuncio, é bom, mas poderia ser melhor, a bateria dura no máximo 2 horas e o carregamento 100% também leva em torno de 2 horas, no que se refere a conforto ficou um pouco a desejar, mas isso não impede sua usabilidade, só fiquei decepcionado com a Horizom do facebook, pois não consegui acessa-lo devido não estar disponível em minha região (Curitiba/PR/Brasil), achei estranho isso, pois supostamente deveria funcionar por ser internet, qualquer dica é bem vinda para solucionar esse problema, no mais, recomendo.
review_date: Reviewed in Brazil on 22 April 2022

one_reviews_text: Las oculus funcionan de maravilla, la manera en que detecta el entorno es de lo mejor que he visto en lentes de realidad virtual, además de que ya no se necesita una pc super potente para correr los juegos es lo mejor, la batería es corta pero considero que te llega a las dos horas y media y el strap que tanto critican yo no le tengo ningún pero, si pudiera ser mejor pero no es nada del otro mundo. Como son blancas se ensucian un montón, no importa si tienes las manos limpias pasan los días y tanto como los controles y el visor ya van a estar sucio, además de que las straps son dificilísimos de limpiar. Lo realmente malo de este producto es que los juegos son excesivamente caros a comparación de un PC, hablo de que en ocasiones le suben hasta un 40% el costo del juego a comparación de comprarlo en computadora, por lo que si tienes una pc buena lo razonable es comprar el cable de 5 metros y comprar los juegos en la pc pero esa idea de stan alone ya se elimina por completo que era su principal diferenciador. También si existe un cataloga de unos 40 a 50 juegos muy top, pero que son juegos que en 1 día los terminas y por lo que pagas hasta aveces no sientes que valgan la pena, y también existen juegos muy meh que no valen la pena, siento yo que les hace falta un filtro de juegos mas bueno. Para ver videos, netflix y ese tipo de apps realmente si tienes una inmersión mejor que solamente verlo en pantalla.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 15 April 2022

one_reviews_text: O Produto é ótimo, cumpre mais do que promete, pois te dá uma imersão na VR fora do real. Para quem já utilizou outros VR's, vai se surpreender com esse. Recomendo pesquisarem bem no YouTube, assistir vídeos pois é um investimento alto, mas que para quem gosta, vale cada centavo. Não dei 5 estrelas, apesar de merecer, mais por uma questão de ser verdadeiro sobre a qualidade geral do produto. A durabilidade dele vai depender do quanto de cuidado você terá, pois ele se apresenta frágil, ou seja, uma queda pode danificar, mas tomando cuidados, é uma ótima diversão. Sua bateria dura cerca de 2 hrs, o bastante para cansar uma pessoa, mas se você estiver em Grupo de Amigos, a bateria vai fazer falta, recomendo um upgrade de bateria externa ou powerbank com um cabo. Custo benefício é outro ponto complicado, além do preço do produto ser alto, se prepare para comprar jogos em Dólares, jogos bons por volta de 19 dólares e jogos mais requintados entre 24 e 30 dólares, então é um investimento que tem que se levar em consideração. Se os preços não te assustam, compre e seja feliz, porque vale a pena, principalmente para roda de família e amigos. E ultima recomendação, recomendo ter um ChromeCast ou similar para transmitir na TV, pois daí todos assistem o que vc está assistindo, risadas garantidas.
review_date: Reviewed in Brazil on 7 April 2022
review_title: Uma nova visão da Realidade Virtual. Produto inovador.

one_reviews_text: Received the latest manufactured device dated March 22. Really happy with the seller sending me the latest model which has no defects.Initially I had some doubts about the lens being defected due to the corners, edges having some dots. I dont know what they are could be to stick the lens to the frame.Might take some time to know the best IPD setting, first I had it set on 2 but wasn't happy with the blurry vision then changed to 3 and now it's all clear.Seller is genuine and if you are planning to purchase, purchase it.It might take a little while to set yourself from the vection, as you feel the motion sickness in games which has continuous movement. But you can get used to it slowly.Overall I am really enjoying Oculus Quest 2.Must try Apps:Horizon Venues,Multiverse.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 25 April 2022

one_reviews_text: Es un gran preducto.. bastante imersivo.. si ya has usado unos VR antes entonces te gustaran bastante por lo facil de usar, pero si es la primera vez y esperas ver el mayor avance tecnológico en entretenimiento... bueno en algunos aspectos podria ser. Visualmente se ve bastante bien.. pero no se ve comoletamente nitido, no es por que este dañado sino es la tecnologia que se tiene.. el sonido es bastante bueno!.. para rl tamaño de bocinas, es bastante nitido el sonido y los bajos son buenos... Es mejor usar unos audifonos claroo.. pero para la comidad de no traer audifonos es bastante bueno.Recomendacion... Si lo vas a usar en seciones largas te recomiendo completamente pensar en invertir en un strap elite mejor que el que  lleva por defecto, no es incomoda la que tiene pero en seciones largas si es un poco molesto afemas que es dificil ajustarla exactamente para que no tengas defectos visuales al usarlo.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 3 February 2022

one_reviews_text: Increíble Producto, sigue impresionando la realidad virtual, excelente que puedas usarlo sin cables, solo ponértelo conectarte wifi y listo, puede conectarse al teléfono o la computadora, para que mientras alguien juega tu puedas ver lo que la persona ve en el VR, satisfecho con la compra, con el precio y con la entrega que llego antes de tiempo. Todo excelente
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 28 September 2021

one_reviews_text: Pros first.Videos and games look very real.There are some animations that are awesome.Guardian boundry is a good concept. Keeps you inside a safe boundry in VR.You can enable option to see an outline of someone enters your guardian boundry... Helps.The device looks durable. I one smashed the controller in the wall. It saved my hand, also nothing happened to it.Works standalone. You can take it to your friends and family and let them experience it also.Cons.Resolution could be better.Content is there... But still not much or enough as of now.The straps have to be adjusted each time you wear it.Gets very hot inside the device. I sweat like crazy and it gets blurry after some time may be because of water vapour condensing on the lens.OverallI'm playing Resident evil 4, experience is very good overall. Also installed blade and sorcery, it's good experience, but the game does not have story mode yet, just some arenas to fight with some enemies. Overall a very good experience till now. I will try to get the cable and connect to pc and try the pc VR games next, PC needs to be upgraded though. Five stars to the product.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 24 April 2022

one_reviews_text: A experiência de poder jogar na realidade virtual com o seus amigos, ou ver videos, filmes e séries, é surpreendentemente incrivel! estou completamente apaixonada pelo Oculus quest 2, mas infelizmente nem tudo é perfeito. A bateria do oculus dura em torno de 2 a 3 horas, (depende do que você pretende fazer, e suas configurações), infelizmente é bem pouco tempo para os viciados nessa experiência, mas eu já tinha ciência dessa parte antes de comprar. Mas o problema que realmente está me incomodando é o fato do analogico do controle esquerdo começou a se mover sozinho e bugar em alguns jogos, isso estraga bastante a experiência.
review_date: Reviewed in Brazil on 20 April 2022

one_reviews_text: Debo comenzar por decir que sí son sorprendentes. Te imaginas cómo serán, pero al probarlos realmente supera tus expectativas. Al paso de los días ya comienzas a normalizar esa tecnología e incluso puedes llegar a pensar en aspectos a mejorar (como los gráficos, los cuales, por cierto, son los que deben ser para el precio en el que están las gafas).Compré las gafas porque quería hacer un escritorio virtual con muchos monitores. Aunque se supone que ya hay como 3 apps que lo hacen, en realidad no se logra eso tan sencillamente y lamentablemente los desarrolladores no te dicen la causa precisa, sino que te tienes que ir dando cuenta por qué no se puede tan fácilmente (llevo alrededor de 20 horas netas investigando y, aunque aún no lo descubro con certeza, creo que ha sido porque la tarjeta gráfica de mi computadora no es apta para sus gafas y otra razón es el internet que no sé por qué pero en las gafas falla más que en una computadora, me falta también probar apps de paga, pero me preocupa pagar por ellas y que tampoco funcionen)
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 31 January 2022
review_title: Te sorprenden!!! (aunque no he logrado mi objetivo: un escritorio virtual)

one_reviews_text: Most affordable headset to play Half-life: Alyx! So far my experience has been great. There is a minor issue that plugging it into a desktop PC you cannot use the link cable to play while charging the headset. This is a limitation of the desktop motherboards rather than the device. Get a powered usb hub to charge your oculus quest 2 while playing!
review_date: Reviewed in Singapore on 12 October 2021
review_title: Remember to buy a powered usb hub to charge the device while playing!

one_reviews_text: Packing was good, came two days ahead of scheduled delivery giving me a long weekend to explore.Setting up was straight forward. Me and my daughter use spectacles so took some time adjust but now very comfortable.Most VR apps on App Store is priced high.Probably each person in family who uses it heavily needs his/her own device. Hope family app sharing is offered by meta.usb c cable include is short so you can’t play games while it is charging , longer cable 2-3 meter might be necessary.Hope in coming years the weight is reduced, screen resolution gets improved all metaverse projects like decentraland all are available as apps
review_date: Reviewed in India on 18 January 2022

one_reviews_text: First of all im glad i got a perfectly sealed box,so they are selling genuine products.If its your first vr experiance the demo will blow you away,really immersive experience.Sadly,we cant buy any paid apps or games with our cards due to the new regulations on recurring payments,hopefully facebook will resolve this.So right now pcvr is the only option to get games,so might as well order a long pcvr usb cable along with it...the product itself is 5 stars
review_date: Reviewed in India on 12 March 2022

one_reviews_text: Es un producto genial, he tenido algunos problemas cuando la pantalla se queda en negro después de que se suspende, lo que me hace volverlo a quitar y a poner. En general cumple mis expectativas. Aunque hay muchos factores a tomar en cuenta para comprarlos. Pero las baterías tanto de los controles y del dispositivo duran mucho para ser un aparato tan complejo, aproximadamente 2 a 3 horas de los lentes y de 30 a 40 horas cada control.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 26 October 2021

one_reviews_text: This is my first ever VR experience, I gave it to my mum to try it, she loved it. She was saying "Kids I am living here forever, make your own food and live" hahaha. I played the Jurassic park immersive video, she loved it, she was "Kids save me, this dino is probably going to eat me" hahahaFew things to note:The default band is not stable enough to keep the vr lens in correct position for even a short period of moment. Might have to invest in a better band but in Amazon India things are crazy expensive!
review_date: Reviewed in India on 15 March 2022
review_title: My first VR Experience! Its just amazing!

one_reviews_text: Great product on this price range.Pros.Great visual effectsMore free content to exploreNice controllersNo wiresNo PC requiredCons.Head strap is a bit uncomfortable for long time use.Sweating at eyes areaMoisture forms at lenses if use more than 30 min.Battery to be better life ( got 90 min for gaming, 120 min for explore content).
review_date: Reviewed in India on 20 April 2022

one_reviews_text: Cuando Mark Zuckerberg decida liberar sus productos reconsideraré mi reseña; por lo pronto aquellos que nos importan un cacahuate las redes sociales y sólo queremos jugar usando nuestras PCs se verán obligados a abrir una cuenta o usar la que abandonaron hace una década...El producto es bueno y Air Link es excepcional, el trackeo se pierde de vez en cuando pero nada que un reboot no arregle; ésta es la mejor opción en VR por el momento en relación precio-calidad.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 13 February 2022
review_title: Hasta la fecha requiere cuenta de Facebook

one_reviews_text: I received my oculus quest 2 few days and it is amazing. I was hesitant to buy it first because I never owned a VR headset but once I tried it on, those feelings went away. The amount of technology facebook managed to build into this is amazing. It has a flagship processor, 4 cameras with tracking tech, 2 1080p screen and 2 tracking hand controllers. As someone who loves technology, this is unheard of in this price range. The closest thing is the HTC VIVE VR headset and it close 3 times as much with more complicated set up. I would suggest anyone who loves tech to buy this thing. Just make sure your IPD is in the range of this headset or else the vision will be blurry.P.S. If you do not like facebook or their practices, stay away from this headset because everything you do will be through your facebook account.
review_date: Reviewed in Singapore on 4 February 2022
review_title: Mindblowing if you are new to VR

one_reviews_text: It's really blurGuys don't buy it 🥲I'm regretting buying this on my birthday there is lot of network issue and trackers are trash also the strap is very poor quality my worst purchase ever all the others in review must be paid or something cause I don't like this vr at all I had so high hope 😭😭😭😭😭😭😭I want my money back
review_date: Reviewed in India on 8 April 2022

one_reviews_text: Pros: At this price does its job perfectly. Good built quality, Played HL Alyx with cable to PC. and was perfect. 3D movies do well too.Cons: Needs facebook login to work. Virtual desktop does not work. Available in white colour only, gets dirty fast. Fully satisfied. Recommended.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 19 April 2022
review_title: Worth every penny. Was waiting for this to roll out.

one_reviews_text: O produto chegou com um dia de atraso, mas o prazo de entrega não era tão relevante para mim. Veio bem embalado e protegido, produto de ótima qualidade e sem defeitos. Pelo pouco que já usei, eu sei que vou viciar hahahaha os jogos da store são salgados (entre 9,99 e 39,99 dólares em média, que bom q o dólar desvalorizou um pouco rsrs), mas tem tmb os jogos gratuitos (alguns oferecem uma demo, por exemplo). Toda minha família já testou e amou! A imersão é absurda e cativante, sem arrependimentos ❣️Um dos únicos pontos negativos é a bateria, não dura mais que três horas infelizmente.
review_date: Reviewed in Brazil on 5 May 2022
review_title: Produto excepcional! Melhor aquisição do ano com certeza 😊

one_reviews_text: Produto entregue pela Total Express, demorou chegar pois passou por fiscalização aduaneira entretanto como já foi importado não me cobraram nenhuma taxa. Chegou mal embalado e com a caixa amassada, fiquei com medo de não funcionar. O produto em si chegou intacto e até agora funciona bem. Possui um sistema operacional próprio com jogos e aplicativos em realidade virtual e também possui a opção de conectar a um computador, porém o computador precisa ter uma capacidade gráfica boa para proporcionar uma experiência satisfatória. É muito divertido de usar e muito bom para se divertir com outras pessoas, pois possui capacidade de espelhar o que é visto pelo usuário em um navegador web. O único óculos de RV viável no Brasil.
review_date: Reviewed in Brazil on 22 February 2022

one_reviews_text: El Oculus Quest 2 es una de las mejores adquisiciones tecnológicas que he hecho en los últimos años.Un excelente producto para iniciarte en la Realidad Virtual. Es inalámbrico y la resolución increíble!La variedad de juegos y aplicaciones es muy vasta para comenzar a iniciarse en este ámbito y el que además pueda conectarse a una PC Gamer de manera inalámbrica hace que las posibilidades de diversión y desarrollo se multipliquen aún más. Los gráficos jugando con el Oculus conectado a una PC Gamer son todavía aún  mejores, pero aún así, sin utlilizar una PC, existen muchas aplicaciones y juegos cuya experiencia visual es fantástica.  El Oculus Quest 2 es una opción definitivamente muy recomendable!
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 14 March 2022
review_title: Increíble dispositivo para iniciarte en la RV

one_reviews_text: Great product from Oculus. The best VR device in the market right now. 128 gb will be enough for a regular user. And there are so many apps to explore and so many 360 video based content.Only con is that after buying you'll still have to pay for exploring any good app from Meta. So it's not like your purchases will end after buying this device.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 31 January 2022

one_reviews_text: I received this product earlier than expected delivery date and the product condition was new and intact. The outer Amazon box packaging can be improved.I'm enjoying quest 2 as a standalone headset and the content on the store is amazing, but we need a credit card with transactions enabled and 2 factor authentication disabled to make any purchases from quest store. Its airlink feature works seamlessly like you are actually running the pcvr over the cable. Best wireless connectivity I've seen so far on any device. Will post a long-term review soon.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 20 March 2022
review_title: Great product and best delivery experience

one_reviews_text: Muito bom, porém infelizmente acabei tendo problema de drift nos analógio, procurei e vi que muitos tem, geralmente ocorre por conta de poeira e a solução é limpa contato. Esse problema pode ocorrer com qualquer analógico então paciência rsrs.A bateria dura em media 30-1h depende do uso, recomendo que compre o bobo vr m2  com bateria(Não tem tanto conforto o que vem) caso for jogar pela bateria, é caro, mais para quem comprou o fone  que já é absurdo haha.A utilização via Cabo(não rola com o cabo que vem) o cabo que bem nele não é USB e é bem curto, para conseguir utilizar de boa precisa ser 3.2 o USB, em teste no 3.0 a bateria dura muito mais, porém não carrega durante uso.
review_date: Reviewed in Brazil on 16 May 2022

one_reviews_text: Achei ele desconfortável, pesa muito na cabeça, me deu dor de cabeça depois de poucos minutos, embaça fácil a tela, tela com cores “mortas” e os pretos meio acinzentados, regulagem de IPD muito limitada. Infelizmente não gostei. Para o preço realmente é um dos melhores custo-benefício do mercado para quem se aventura, mas vou esperar para a tecnologia amadurecer mais. Estou acionando a devolução.
review_date: Reviewed in Brazil on 12 March 2022

one_reviews_text: Llevo ya un tiempo usando el casco en varios tipos de juegos, y la verdad estoy sorprendido como la pantalla tiene una increíble resolución y tasa de refresco, la inmersión en los juegos es muy buenaAntes habia probado el primer oculus (el cv1) y la verdad si es una diferencia enorme, ademas de no requerir instalar estaciones para poder jugar, literal es de solo ponerse el casco unas pilas para los controles, y listo, ya puedes jugar VR.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 5 May 2022

one_reviews_text: I love this. Its very addictive and can make you sick and dizzy, initially people with motion sickness will suffer for some time... To avoid motion sickness keep shaking your legs it may help you a bit.Games on Oculus are expenssiveStarts from 9$ to 50 $Cricket I purchased for 29$ + tax  INR 2400There are so many stuff to do on OculusBut all of them are bot addictiveGames are addictive but ExpensiveJust like PS4 - XBOX games....Irritates in summer and long time playYou will sweat a lot.....Dont let others use your headset just for Hygine issue... as they gonna leave sweat on it. COMES IN WITH NICE PACKING
review_date: Reviewed in India on 11 March 2022

one_reviews_text: El producto no puede durar mas de unos segundos en la luz del sol, si planeas sacarlo por cualquier razon o transportarlo tienes que comprarle su proteccion o cubrirlo bien, solo de camino de mi casa al auto (como 10 mts) se quemo la pantalla y ahora tiene unas manchas permanentesEn tanto a software tiene muchos problemas, errores graves y sistema guardián que se bugea en muchas ocasiones, te quedas en una pantalla vacía.es muy fragil, oculus no vende refacciones, por lo que lo que sea que le pase a los lentes o la pantalla sera permanente.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 4 April 2022
review_title: NO LO PONGAS EN LA LUZ

one_reviews_text: While the device is easy to setup. There is alot of improvements needed. First the device can't fit with my glasses. Wearing it is pretty heavy , after 20mins it's really tiring to wear longer. Only the centre of your view point is sharp, if u move your eyesight without moving yout head u will notice the images are blurred. Not good for eyes if u wear longer. I am very disappointed that there is no std cable to the pc. An additional link cable cost a whopping 99dollar. And the game store has very little games, the better games are on steam. For a $500 purchase, I rather buy a ps5 or a Nintendo switch.....
review_date: Reviewed in Singapore on 1 May 2022

one_reviews_text: VR experience is amazing.device is from US. It comes with US flat pin plug.at some angles it is blurry and needs to be readjusted.It works without phone. You can directly copy files to device from windows machine via usb cable.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 30 November 2021

one_reviews_text: Received a used piece from the seller. And it did'nt work. Be careful as to not recieve a used piece from this seller.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 18 January 2022

one_reviews_text: Después de eliminar unos zombies, corté cajas con mis katanas y regresé a mi casa a jugar con mi Oculus Quest 2. Ya en serio. Si tienes Pc esta versión te conviene, ya que al reproducir los juegos en la computadora no necesitas el espacio del visor y te ahorras unos dineros. La inmersión es buena y el audio sorprende. Al ser blanco se ensucia con facilidad, tanto el plástico como las tiras de tela. El AirLink (Conexión remota) es decente y se está mejorando. Se recomienda el cable link y/o un buen modem exclusivo para el Oculus, pero eso ya es inversión para mejorar la experiencia.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 7 May 2022

one_reviews_text: Oculus quest 2 is amazing
review_date: Reviewed in India on 17 April 2022

one_reviews_text: El oculus dejo de funcionar, apaga y prende y ya no deja jugar. Que recomiandan hacer??
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 1 January 2022
review_title: Prende y se apaga solo, no reconoce la cerca guardián

one_reviews_text: Olá. Deu uma atrasada por causa que a amazon coloca o tempo de espera como se fossem dias corridos e no caso os correios contam somente dias uteis, o produto veio lacrado e está funcionando normalmente, veio exatamente nas configurações que pedi...
review_date: Reviewed in Brazil on 21 January 2022

one_reviews_text: Por su precio es una excelente inversión si quieres empezar en VR, tiene buen espacio, es barato, no necesitas equipamiento extra, buen catalogo de juegos y en general muy bueno.Algunos problemas que me he encontrado sin embargo es que para el juego VRchat este visor no es el mejor (Es un juego social, en este juego es posible mover el cuerpo entero con otros visores, con el Quest 2 solo la cabeza y manos). No se pueden ver peliculas acostado, cosa que hubiera estado genial. A veces el seguimiento falla en algunos juegos. Es un poco entretenido ver que opción de IPD es la que mejor se te acomoda, y tienes que tener el visor quieto para poder ver bien en vez de ligeramente borroso.En conclusión, un visor genial, solo necesitas invertir un poco en una correa nueva para la cabeza.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 14 September 2021
review_title: Excelente visor para empezar con VR

one_reviews_text: Estou testando faz só dois dias mais o material é de qualidade não veio nada com defeito, ele esquenta aproximadamente uns 40 a 50 graus, ja estou jogando resident evil 4 vr, usar ele por um longo tempo faz ter dores de cabeça e tontura carrega rápido e dura por um tempo consideravel ja que não consigo usar por muito tempo dura em torno de 2 horas ou um pouco mais, Recomendo por estar em um preço bom e chegar rápido mais o valor do jogo que foi 200 reais e a loja dele é só em dólar então vai ficar um pouco caro.
review_date: Reviewed in Brazil on 11 March 2022

one_reviews_text: Got this beauty for myself and my son. Yesterday we set it up and it was a breeze.The strap is not designed for smaller heads and hence I had to use a simple hack to fit it to my son's head.Rest is all perfect till now.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 30 March 2022

one_reviews_text: Powerful hardware and complete package for the price.  However, I still buy a better headstrap, silicon protection cover for the controller and headset, eye mask etc for better comfort and protection.Lots of capabilities in the hardware. Lots of free software to explore.
review_date: Reviewed in Singapore on 6 February 2022

one_reviews_text: El envío fue rápido y se manejó de manera propia, la caja estaba en excelentes condiciones al igual que el producto.En cuanto al producto en sí, es una muy buena manera de experimentar la realidad virtual de una manera muy fiel sin el uso o requerimiento de una pc potente, pero incluso si se tuviera esta pc, el headset tiene la posibilidad de ser conectado y de usarse como un periférico para la pc, esta versatilidad es lo que más me ha gustado de este producto al igual de que cuenta con una batería que te da de 1 a 3 horas de juego cuando la batería está cargada al 100%
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 22 October 2021

one_reviews_text: If you have a gaming pc then my friend you are in for a treat. Every game will be 1/3 of the price that you will pay in oculas store. I bought like 7 games worth of 1 game in oculas store during this steam festive discount. Also in desktop beat saber you can use custom songs and play.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 7 January 2022

one_reviews_text: Produto original e chegou antes do previsto. Ótimo custo beneficio do Oculus Quest 2, única desvantagem é o preço convertido em dollar na store e o tempo da bateria. Além do investimento pago no Oculus existem outros produtos que valem comprar assim que possivel como: Uma alça mais confortável com power bank, case para guardar ou transportar e capas protetoras de silicone para os controles... como se trata de um produto importado o investimento vai além do Oculus.
review_date: Reviewed in Brazil on 11 May 2022

one_reviews_text: Muy buen producto, aconsejable tener Oculus Link y una buena pc para sacar el jugo a los juegos, comprar implementos necesarios en dependencia de los juegos que juegues.Poca bateria si tiene, es lo unico mejorable de momento.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 14 January 2022

one_reviews_text: Yo tengo el psvr en ps4 y la verdad de jugar con eso y tener todos los cables y montaje a tener una cosa compacta que no ocupa mas que un maletin y puedes jugar en todos lados hay una gran diferencia. los juegos además son más nitidos. Hay una gran variedad de juegos. Muy muy recomendado para empezar a vivir la experiencia del meta verse.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 21 January 2022

one_reviews_text: Meta (Facebook) have hit a home run with this device. Your gateway to the meta verse and VR!!Very well made device, even for those who wear spectacles. Amazing 3D visual experience with stunning sound clarity. Loads of free and paid titles / apps to play, learn, exercise etc.
review_date: Reviewed in India on 18 February 2022

one_reviews_text: PRÓS: Imersão maravilhosa, diversão garantida. Os vídeos no YouTube não é igual pegar o console e jogar. Você entra no jogo, cada passo dado é pensado.CONTRA: Bateria dura em média 2 horas (alguns jogos você se cansa antes de acabar a bateria, mas outros você precisa deixar carregando para continuar). O valor de mercado aqui no Brasil ainda é caro, mas pela experiência ainda vale a pena. A loja de jogos oficial é em Dolar, isso é uma pena.
review_date: Reviewed in Brazil on 24 April 2022

one_reviews_text: Mto bom, para quem usa óculos de grau recomendo o uso de lentes de contato pois dependendo da armação msm com o espaçador para óculos ainda é desconfortável, mas nd que atrapalhe a experiência.
review_date: Reviewed in Brazil on 8 February 2022

one_reviews_text: THE ITEM WAS SUPPOSED TO BE NEW.1. THE ITEM WAS USED2. MICROFIBER CLEANING CLOTH WAS MISSING3. CONTROLLER BATTERIES WERE AT 90 PERCENT WHEN CHECKED.BESIDES THE ABOVETHE VR HEADSET IS A PAIN IN THE NECK.BURNS EYESHURTS THE EYESFACEBOOK ACCOUNT IS COMPULSORYAT FULL RESOLUTION, IT CAN GET JITTERYMOST GAMES THAT ARE GOOD ARE PAID AND EXPENSIVEOVERALL, A BAD EXPERIENCE.

one_reviews_text: El producto nunca se entregó y al hablar con servicio al cliente sólo dijeron que podían hacer un reembolso del monto pagado, no podían pedir el artículo nuevamente y “una gran disculpa”.No fueron capaz de satisfacer las necesidades del cliente o resarcir el tiempo perdido.

one_reviews_text: I purchased OC2 for my personal use, after 5 days of delivery remotes are not working properly, replaced with same product, same issue found in another one as well.

review_title: Very bad quality product, don't purchase it

one_reviews_text: El producto se nota de buena calidad a pesar de ser de plastico. En México a veces por no haber tiendas oficiales les sube. Mucho los precios. A pesar de que al comprar te cobran una comision de importación (Que ya viene incluida en el precio) sale mas economico y directo con el proveedor original. Me llego aprox entre 4 y 5 dias a CDMX.Y sobre el oculus es super entretenido para toda la familia.

one_reviews_text: Its definitely future... But have device... Can be for 3d movie.. Games... Meeting mew people...

one_reviews_text: La calidad de la imagen es excelente. Los controles funcionan de maravilla. Resident Evil 4 es una compra obligatoria! Echo VR es divertidisimo para jugar con amigos.

review_title: Es tan bueno que mi primo se compró uno.

one_reviews_text: Son la mejores gafas de realidad virtual, encerio no lo piensen más, si quieres comprar estas gafas, comprarlas ahora mismo! Son las mejores hasta el momento y tiene una calidad muy buena, yo uso lentes y las e usado sin los lentes y aun así se siguen viendo bien, no lo pienses mas :3
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on 6 January 2022

one_reviews_text: For a first-time user, I thought the experience was pretty amazing! I loved watching and playing in VR. The initial How-To steps were really helpful too. I did face slight eye strain concerns but that could be because I am not used to using a VR headset. I really look forward to learning and playing on it.

review_title: Amazing experience esp. for first-time users

one_reviews_text: . In this time of covid, paying full for a second hand experience sucks. I want to buy the product but now I’m worried if I’ll get a new one.
